verbose_text: Our initial studies on the adenosine triphosphate (ATP)-purinergic receptor pathway demonstrated that stimulation by exogenous ATP improved tissue growth and properties but elicited matrix turnover under high doses (250 muM) potentially due to the accumulation of extracellular inorganic pyrophosphate (ePPi).
